review: Love it!  Easy to set up even for me, a 65 y/o nontechie.

review: Easy to set up and use it every day!

review: Now my mother can quit using her laptop as a netflix machine on the TV.

review: Would prefer more conservative family friendly movies. The main reason I wanted it was that these types of movies are very limited on network TV.

review: I've used it only a hand full of times a twice it seemed to scramble the signal.

review: Fire TV Stick is a great way to access all our Prime TV and Movies easily from our tv.  Much better viewing for us than on a pc or smart device. Glad we ordered it!

review: Fast response and my grandchildren use the remote just fine for games.

review: My daughter loved this gift.  She uses it daily.
